title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms               Parks as Classrooms         NPS Photo  Plan a Field Trip Visit Carlsbad Caverns with your students for a fulfilling, educational experience. Find resources for planning your trip, fee waivers, and more.  Â      Photo by Emily Ficker  Curriculum Materials Incorporate Carlsbad Caverns curriculum into your classroom. Review several different lesson plans and curricula.
